metadata.name: HackTool - WinRM Access Via Evil-WinRM
metadata.comment: Adversaries may use Valid Accounts to log into a computer using the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). The adversary may then perform actions as the logged-on user.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\ruby.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-i ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-p ')))

output.summary: Adversaries may use Valid Accounts to log into a computer using the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). The adversary may then perform actions as the logged-on user.
